name: Djent
description: Groovy polymeters, syncopated power chord chugs, palm-muted, distorted guitars, and significant focus on production and tone.

children.name: Thall
children.description: Utilizes rapid release bends and a precise playstyle while contrasting pitch-shifted high and low notes, with ambient sections for atmosphere and buildup.
